name: RWSApps | OnEnter | jQuery Plugin
tagline: Automatically creates a Javascript handle for all onenter events the same way browsers natively support onclick, onblur, etc.
body:
### Dependencies OnEnter requires the jQuery library. Please [download](http://jquery.com/download/) the jQuery library and include it in the head of your html page. ### Easy Implementation OnEnter is automatically enabled when the Javascript file is included. Simply add the attribute "onenter" to any element, and it will be execute like any other Javascript event. ``` ``` ### Dynamic Content Support OnEnter supports fields that are generated dynamically from Javascript or AJAX calls. Simply execute OnEnter.detect(); and OnEnter will re-parse the DOM. ```
``` [Browse full documentation site](http://jquery.rwsapps.com/OnEnter).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
